item.title: Anna Wintour Taps Chloe Malle as Vogue U.S. Head of Editorial
item.description: Malle, who currently leads digital editorial for Vogue, is the daughter of actress Candice Bergen and director Louis Malle.

item.title: Graydon’s Grand Old Party: The Making of Hollywood’s Biggest Bash
